contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Waldo, Alabama |settlement_type = [[Town]] |image_skyline = Waldo Alabama.JPG |imagesize = |image_caption = Waldo Town Hall & Volunteer Fire Department |image_seal = |image_map = Talladega_County_Alabama_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Waldo_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location in [[Talladega County, Alabama|Talladega County]] and the state of [[Alabama]] |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |coordinates_region = US-AL |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[US state|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in Alabama|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Alabama]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Talladega County, Alabama|Talladega]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 7.4 |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_km2 = 7.3 |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_km2 = 0.1 |area_water_sq_mi = |elevation_ft = 705 |elevation_m = 215 |population_as_of = 2010 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 283 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = 38.8 |population_density_sq_mi = |timezone = [[Central Time Zone (North America)|Central (CST)]] |utc_offset = -6 |latd = 33 |latm = 23 |lats = 37 |latNS = N |longd = 86 |longm = 1 |longs = 58 |longEW = W |timezone_DST = CDT |utc_offset_DST = -5 |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 01-79488 |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 0160790 |footnotes = |website = }} '''Waldo''' is a town in [[Talladega County, Alabama|Talladega County]], [[Alabama]], [[United States]]. At the 2010 census the population was 283.<ref name="Census 2010">{{cite web| url=http://factfinder2.census.gov/bkmk/table/1.0/en/DEC/10_DP/G001/1600000US0179488| title=Geographic Identifiers: 2010 Demographic Profile Data (G001): Waldo town, Alabama| publisher=U.S. Census Bureau, American Factfinder| accessdate=January 28, 2013}}</ref> ==Geography== Waldo is located at {{coord|33|23|37|N|86|1|58|W|type:city}} (33.393674, -86.032763){{GR|1}}. According to the [[U.S. Census Bureau]], the town has a total area of {{convert|7.4|km2|disp=flip}}, of which {{convert|7.3|km2|disp=flip}} is land and {{convert|0.1|km2|disp=flip}}, or 1.82%, is water.<ref name="Census 2010"/> ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 281 people, 102 households, and 74 families residing in the town. The [[population density]] was 98.9 people per square mile (38.2/km²). There were 114 housing units at an average density of 40.1 per square mile (15.5/km²). The racial makeup of the town was 55.16% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 44.48% [[Race (United States Census)|Black]] or [[Race (United States Census)|African American]], and 0.36% from two or more races. There were 102 households out of which 27.5% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 50.0% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 21.6% had a female householder with no husband present, and 26.5% were non-families. 21.6% of all households were made up of individuals and 5.9% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.75 and the average family size was 3.25. In the town the population was spread out with 24.2% under the age of 18, 10.0% from 18 to 24, 25.3% from 25 to 44, 28.8% from 45 to 64, and 11.7% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 40 years. For every 100 females there were 103.6 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 95.4 males. The median income for a household in the town was $26,563, and the median income for a family was $31,750. Males had a median income of $31,364 versus $19,375 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the town was $13,743. About 19.6% of families and 17.5% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 15.4% of those under the age of eighteen and 22.2% of those sixty five or over. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Coord|display=title|33.393674|-86.032763}} {{Talladega County, Alabama}} [[Category:Populated places in Talladega County, Alabama]] [[Category:Towns in Alabama]]
